import React, { useState } from "react"; import { resumeUpdater } from "../../utils"; const Education = (...props) => { const { resume, setResume } = props[0]; const [educatonFormCount, seteducatonFormCount] = useState(() => { const getEductionFormCount = parseInt( localStorage.getItem("educationFormCount") ); if (!getEductionFormCount) return 1; return getEductionFormCount; }); const changeResumeInfo = (page, key, value, internal_key) => { resumeUpdater(resume, setResume, page, key, value, internal_key); }; const addAnotherForm = () => { localStorage.setItem("educationFormCount", educatonFormCount + 1); seteducatonFormCount((preVal) => preVal + 1); }; return (
{Array.from(Array(educatonFormCount).keys()).map((el) => { return (

Education

Give a detailed look into your academic history.

changeResumeInfo("education", "school", e.target.value, el) } required >
changeResumeInfo("education", "degree", e.target.value, el) } required >
changeResumeInfo( "education", "school_city", e.target.value, el ) } required >
changeResumeInfo( "education", "education_start_date", e.target.value, el ) } required >
changeResumeInfo( "education", "education_end_date", e.target.value, el ) } required >
); })}

); }; export default Education;
